excerpt: This vegan version of classic lasagna is perfect for a cozy night in.

ingredients.name: tofu ricotta cheese
ingredients.notes: blend tofu, lemon juice, garlic, and nutritional yeast

instructions: Boil the lasagna noodles according to package instructions.
Combine tofu ricotta cheese, spinach, and salt in a bowl.
Layer the marinara sauce, noodles, and tofu mixture in a 9x13 inch baking dish.
Sprinkle vegan mozzarella cheese on top.
Cover with foil and bake for 45 minutes.
Remove the foil and bake for another 15 minutes or until the cheese is melted.
Let it cool for 10-15 minutes before serving.
